attributes.action: Implement Basic Universal Income for all citizens over 16, with N.I number.
attributes.additional_details:
We are in an unprecedented crisis, both medically & commercially. The consequences for all are far reaching; most people face immediate economic hardship. Basic Universal Income ensures business & self employed survive the current conditions & our economic landscape will not be so damaged. Workers facing long unemployment & self isolation will be able to pay rent & feed families, along with other vulnerable groups in the UK. 
DWP should be overhauled, with BUI replacing state pension & benefits.
attributes.background: Immediately pass emergency legislation that creates Basic Universal Income for all. Paid by bank transfer monthly, to all with NI Number & bank account. Amount should reflect cost of living and rent / mortgage payments, i,e £1,500 per month and paid without condition of circumstance.
